title: Seated Figure
description: seated stylized figure with tapering, bowling pin-shaped legs splayed out; very short, small arms with hands on hips; rather flat head; bulbous nose which may have carved ring between nostrils; small smiling mouth; three red lines from forehead over each eye and across cheeks; black diagonal stripes on upper body and diagonal crosshatching on lower body; red lower legs; hole at top back of head
